content.question: The graph shows the position <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> for a cart of mass <math alttext="m equals 3.0 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></math> that moves along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis. What is the magnitude of the change in the cart’s momentum between <math alttext="t equals 4 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> and <math alttext="t equals 10 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.0 kilogram meter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg·m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="2.5 kilogram meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg·m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="4.5 kilogram meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg·m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="7.5 kilogram meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg·m/s</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="7.5 kilogram meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg·m/s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
